name: SALT-eYe
description:
Given a one week development timeframe, a theme of "Salty", and the command to "experiment", I came up with a project that is intended to see if hand-eye coordination can be improved with a simple game.

Drag the salt onto the proper foods. Salt will get smaller as you succeed, or get bigger as you fail.

Warning: Dragging functionality apparently does not translate well to this WebGL format, apologies for that. Full screen is necessary. Music gets stuck in your head forever, so maybe toggle it off.
